altername_name: Stakes Winner - GI Kanzen Seiha e no Michi
name: Stakes Winner: G1 Kanzen Seihahe no Michi
overview: Stakes Winner - G1 Kanzen Seihahe no Michi is the Playstation version of the Neogeo arcade machine (1995) of the same name. Stakes Winner in the arcades offers pushing one of two buttons to make your horse gallop fast, faster, or fastest. There's timing involved, as well as strategy. You'll not only need to weave through the pack, snagging speed and energy power-ups while avoiding collisions, but you must conserve your horse's energy as well. Stakes Winner - G1 Kanzen Seihahe no Michi features sort of a breeding since the player choose the two horses (male and a female ones) to give birth a new horse that he will use to compete in the races.
